Internal projects

Signing Up

Signing Up will be a crash course in sign language. It will be focused on VGT or Flemish Sign Language. This project is still under development, but be sure to take a look at the teaser-site and subscribe for more news.

View website

Marsonia

To experiment with browser game development, we are creating a simple shooter. This project is still under heavy development, and will be released soon!
